ProjectTitle: Biofabrication of remotely actuated skeletal implants using magnetically augmented cartilage-microtissues in alginate microcapsules
InitialFeedbackHistory:
02/03/2023
Data: your data description table is missing, please complete the table in the FWO DMP template
Please explain why there may be dual use issues and list the approval number, please have a look at https://set.kuleuven.be/ethicsatarenberg/expertise-center-ethics-arenberg-1/copy_of_dual-use/dual-use to see if this applies. 
If you work with human material including cells and animals you also need approval from the Ethics Committee Research UZ / KU Leuven and the Ethical committee for animal experimentation (ECD). Please list the approval numbers in your DMP, for more information and application procedures see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/ethics/committees
Your answer to the question about valorization is not clear, please discuss any valorization potential with LRD before publishing: https://lrd.kuleuven.be/
Sharing: can you share data underlying your publications, this is encouraged by FWO and requested by many journals, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
